com.ca.svcode.api

Interface VirtualServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RuntimeServer, TransactionVerificationProvider, VirtualServiceBuilder

    public interface VirtualServer
extends VirtualServiceBuilder, RuntimeServer
    VirtualServer is the entry point for the API and the underlying server which drives virtualization behavior.

    Get instances from VirtualServerFactory.
